serial.__COMMENT__: serial port for the Roomba, e.g. /dev/ttyACM0. Baud rate is 115200 by default for Open Interface 2.

camera.__COMMENT__: camera device path, e.g. /dev/video0. Camera USB address, e.g. 1415:2000

audio.__COMMENT__: microphone device ID, can be obtained using arecord -l

roverDisplay.__COMMENT__: Enable or disable information and driver camera display mounted on the rover.
